verses.verse: <S%H8104>Guard<s%> your <S%H7272>steps<s%> when you <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> for to draw <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> is better than to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H3684>fools,<s%> for they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know that they <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

<S%H926>Don't<s%> be rash with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3820>don't<s%> let your heart be <S%H4116>hasty<s%> to <S%H3318>utter<s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and you on <S%H776>earth.<s%> Therefore let your <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H4592>few.<s%>
For as a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> with a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6045>cares,<s%> so a <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H6963>speech<s%> with a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words.<s%>

When you <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H309>don't<s%> defer to <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H2656>it;<s%> for he has no pleasure in <S%H3684>fools.<s%> <S%H7999>Pay<s%> that which you <S%H5087>vow.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> that you should not <S%H5087>vow,<s%> than that you should <S%H5087>vow<s%> and not <S%H7999>pay.<s%>

<S%H5414>Don't<s%> allow your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to lead <S%H1320>you<s%> into <S%H2398>sin.<s%> <S%H559>Don't<s%> protest <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> that this was a <S%H7684>mistake.<s%> Why should <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H7107>angry<s%> at your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands?<s%>
For in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%> there are <S%H1892>vanities,<s%> as well as in <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> but you must <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

If you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6233>oppression<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor,<s%> and the <S%H1499>violent<s%> taking away of <S%H6664>justice<s%> and <S%H4941>righteousness<s%> in a <S%H4082>district,<s%> <S%H8539>don't<s%> marvel at the <S%H2656>matter:<s%> for one <S%H1364>official<s%> is <S%H8104>eyed<s%> by a <S%H1364>higher<s%> <S%H1364>one;<s%> and there are officials over <S%H5921>them.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H3504>profit<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> is for <S%H4428>all.<s%> The king <S%H5647>profits<s%> from the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> shall not be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3701>silver;<s%> nor he who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H1995>abundance,<s%> with <S%H8393>increase:<s%> this also is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

When <S%H2896>goods<s%> <S%H7235>increase,<s%> those who <S%H398>eat<s%> them are <S%H7231>increased;<s%> and what <S%H3788>advantage<s%> is there to its <S%H1167>owner,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> to <S%H7207>feast<s%> on them with his <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>

The <S%H8142>sleep<s%> of a laboring <S%H5647>man<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> whether he <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> or <S%H7235>much;<s%> but the <S%H7647>abundance<s%> of the <S%H6223>rich<s%> will not <S%H3240>allow<s%> him to <S%H3462>sleep.<s%>

There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H2470>grievous<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun:<s%> <S%H6239>wealth<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> by its <S%H1167>owner<s%> to his <S%H7451>harm.<s%>
Those <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H6045>by<s%> <S%H7451>misfortune,<s%> and if he has <S%H3205>fathered<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> there is <S%H3972>nothing<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

As he came <S%H3318>forth<s%> from his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb,<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> shall he <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H3972>nothing<s%> for his <S%H5999>labor,<s%> which he may carry <S%H3212>away<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H2090>This<s%> also is a <S%H2470>grievous<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> that in all <S%H5980>points<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> so shall he <S%H3212>go.<s%> And what <S%H3504>profit<s%> does he have who <S%H5998>labors<s%> for the <S%H7307>wind?<s%>
All his <S%H3117>days<s%> he also <S%H398>eats<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> he <S%H7235>is<s%> <S%H3707>frustrated,<s%> and has <S%H2483>sickness<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> that which I have seen to be <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3303>proper<s%> is for one to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and to <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in all his <S%H5999>labor,<s%> in which he <S%H5998>labors<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H4557>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2506>him;<s%> for this is his portion.

Every <S%H120>man<s%> also to whom <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> and has given him <S%H7980>power<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H5375>it,<s%> and to take his <S%H2506>portion,<s%> and to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H5999>labor<s%> â€” <S%H2090>this<s%> is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

For he shall not <S%H7235>often<s%> <S%H2142>reflect<s%> on the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life;<s%> because <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6031>occupies<s%> him with the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
